Wsp Petition To Ms About Ie Standards

13 Aug 1999

The Web Standards Project is asking for your participation and support! They're asking that you sign a petition that they will present to Microsoft asking them to support standards 100% in the next version of IE. This is something we all need to sign to let MS know where we stand on the issue of a standards compliant browser!! Check out the petition here.
